com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml
Class EPPWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml.XMLWriter
      com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml.EPPWriter

public class EPPWriter
extends XMLWriter

An EPP-specific implementation of an XMLWriter. Instances of this class set the xml declaration and root element appropriately for EPP service elements and also set the namespace attributes of the root element. This implementation uses a DocumentBuilder to create the XML document which contains the EPP service element. Uses the debug and user level loggers.
